replies.body:
reported for runnin it mid

you could almost say, he _threw_ the game.
reported for making an ill timed joke. too soon bruh.
Reported for using the "too soon" joke too soon.
Reported for talking about reporting.
Reported for reporting.
Reported for being the 5th person in a row in a comment tree to start with the same word as everyone else.
reported for trying to be mildly similar but still different enough to where now i have to create an entirely new comment so as to justify why im reporting you.
All reported because I feel like it.
reported for BREAKING THE SOLIDARITY AND STARTING WITH 'ALL', YOU CHEAP... AAS;LDKFJA;SLDKFJ;ASDLKFJASD;LKFJ
Reported for getting triggered over the breaking of solidarity because a man started his sentence with "all" Good day sir!
Reported for pretending you don't care about the solidarity even though you started with "reported". OH REALLY, GOOD SIR???
Reported all y'all for getting English on the thread
Reported for being racist towards Brits.

@Entropy: Reported for implying women can't be sirs, thus enforcing gender stereotypes and identity suppression.

I mean... what are you trying to say? All women are women? You're a disgrace to attack helicopters everywhere...
Reported for calling me a sir! YOU CANNOT JUST ASSUME GENDER DAMNIT /s
Reported for caring.
Reported for confusing race with ethnicity
Reported for reporting a reporter.
lmao
